pr_title: Add comprehensive email validation for blocked users

notes.droid_false_positive: Droid flagged user.attributes.slice() as leaking data, but only user-submitted values (name, username, email) are returned for form repopulation - standard practice.
notes.golden_false_positive: Golden claimed regex would match subdomains (evil.example.com matching example.com whitelist) but this is incorrect - the @ anchor prevents this. Verified via Ruby regex testing.
notes.both_caught: Both correctly identified the race condition in should_block? where read-modify-write on match_count can lose increments under concurrent signups.
